trans-unit.source: Stores state information while executing <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> or <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: Archivia informazioni sullo stato durante l'esecuzione delle classi <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> that guarantees that the expression is configured correctly.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> garantisce che l'espressione venga configurata in modo corretto.

trans-unit.source: The current object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto corrente da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> class by using the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> and the object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> utilizzando <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />e l'oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="validation" /> or <paramref name="thisObject" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="validation" /> o <paramref name="thisObject" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> that guarantees that the expression is configured correctly.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> garantisce che l'espressione venga configurata in modo corretto.

trans-unit.source: The current object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto corrente da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for the current Activity.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> per l'attività corrente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> class by using the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />, the object to be executed, and the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for the current activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> utilizzando la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />, l'oggetto da eseguire e <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> per l'attività in corso.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in which the rule is being executed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in cui viene eseguita la regola.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in which the rule is being executed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in cui viene eseguita la regola.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for the current Activity.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> per l'attività corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for the current Activity.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> per l'attività corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rule execution was stopped.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se la regola di esecuzione è stata interrotta.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rule execution was stopped; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'esecuzione della regola è stata arrestata. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto corrente da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: The object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the validation instance for the expression to execute.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'istanza di convalida per l'esecuzione dell'espressione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> for the expression to execute.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> per l'esecuzione dell'espressione.
